body:
Comment 5: 
An array/slice is effectively a pointer to a block of memory. When you assign a slice 
to something, you're just assigning a pointer, not creating a copy of the data.

In your example, you only allocate the 2-byte array pType once (with make), and then 
assign the reference to it to several slots of paramType. The results you see are 
expected. It seems like you get this now, though. :-)
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
